summary: The feature doc takes a look behind the scenes at top-class restaurants and offers exclusive interviews with celebrity chefs from France, Spain, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, the USA and Japan.
cast: Yannick Alléno|Elena Arzak|Juan María Arzak|Sven Elverfeld|Trevor Gerard|Sergio Herman|Hideki Ishikawa|Jean-Luc Naret|Rene Redzepi|Olivier Roellinger|Nadia Santini|Jean-Georges Vongerichten
title: Drei Sterne - Die Köche und die Sterne
